description: Returns a list of all deployments of a specific application. A deployment is a combination of a specific application and a specific version of that application. Each deployment is mapped to a particular application version.

nested_items.name: deployments
nested_items.description: The list of deployments that is returned.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the application.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the deployment was created.

nested_items.name: deploymentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the deployment.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the runtime environment.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the deployment.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the reported status.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If there are more items to return, this contains a token that is passed to a subsequent call to this operation to retrieve the next set of items.
